entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 9:50 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023
